1.Flush mouse tibiae and femurs with ice-cold PBS through a 70 μm-wide cut-off cell strainer.
Suspend pelleted cells in conditioned medium \(supplemented with 30% of growth supernatant of M-CSF-transduced L929 cells).
3.Seed 7 x 10<sup>6</sup> cells in 100 x 20 mm non-treated cell culture plates in 10 ml of conditioned medium.
Seed 5 x 10<sup>6</sup> cells in 100 x 20 mm in non-treated cell culture plates in 10 ml of conditioned medium.
6.BMMFs are ready for experimental use when the percentage of CD11b+ cells is higher than 90% as measured by FACS analysis.
